item.title: How to Change a Git Commit Message
item.description: Introdcution In this tutorial, we’ll go over how to fix Git commit messages that have been committed to a local or remote Git repository. Reason to change commit message? When working with Git, there could be several reasons to update the commit message. Some of the common reasons are as follows Message contains a typo. Missing intent of commit. Remove any confidential information. Correct issue ticket number to connect to an issue tracker such as Jira.
